Name: chromium trioxide production, flakes | chromium trioxide, flakes | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Production from sodium dichromate and sulphuric acid according to the wet process scheme, with a process yield of 98%. The inventory is based on stoechiometric calculations. The emissions to air (0.2 wt% of raw material input) and water were estimated using mass balance.
